::KitKat::
She looked at him,"Yes the new is disturbing.  but I have to 
concentrate on Magetron."  She looked down, then looked up at 
Drillbit, then to Desctuctor. "yes, I am up to it. But what worries 
me is what would happen if Megatron succeeded.  He would erase, not 
only himself, which is a pleasing thought. But all transformers here 
on earth. I can't let that happen."  She looked at Drillbit and 
sighed. "No, I can't let that happen. No matter waht happens to me, 
stop him from getting the ark."  She turned ans started towards the 
cave.  She was no longer thinking of revenge.  It was the thought 
that Drillbit would no longer live that made her want to stop him now.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>   "I am sorry if my news disturbes you..but I am hear only to help 
your 
> cause. Are you up to the challenge?"
